item.description:
This walk is from the AMC book "Walk Boston" and includes 6 little known staircases and paths. The route takes us up Summit Path to the Corey Hill outlook where you get a nice view of the north side of the city.

Lunch afterwards at the Public House‎
1648 Beacon St, Brookline, MA‎ - (617) 277-2880‎
item.how_to_find_us: Meet on the corner in front of Athan's Bakery
item.name: Brookline's Secret Stairways and Paths
